channel.title: A New beginning Heres your chance to create greatness
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/s3nj0z.png[/img]
Hello this is the creation of a new beginning . What this new creation will be is a mixture of runescape and league of legends to create something amazing new and unique for a great experence to gamers.
You must know Java extensively, and have a relatively good understanding . It would be beneficial if you had an understanding of any scripting languages, especially Ruby and/or Python as these languages may come into use later down the line of development. Of course content building and upgrading will be required and general debugging in the hosting stages.
All work is to be kept clean an noted to make thing's easier to find and to be organized.
Developer's are not to argue with one another.
Note we will not be using Runescapes client everything will be written from scratch to keep clear of any type of copyright For that being said this project will require people who understand what they are doing and not someone who is only able to copy and paste what they see someone else do
Here is what I have come up with so far that will be in this game so far
The Land of Legends
Skills
Hitpoints = The amount life you can be hit for before dying
Accuracy = How often you hit over a 0 and the better weapons you can weild
Strenght = how high your damage output is
Defence = your ability to take less damage and wear stronger armour
archary = long distance ranged fighting ability high lever better chance to hit
Gods will = special spells used like prayers that are given from god
Mage = special spells for fighting and creating magical things
Endurance = the ability to run longer and regenerate energy faster
Black Smithing = the ability to mine ores and turn them into armour and weapons
Fishing = The ability to fish food and special items needed to bind with another
Crafting the ability to make jewlery and magical runes and leather armours and mystical armours
fletching = ability to supply bows and staffs and ammo
Fearless = The higher level of fearless the more creatures you are able to battle around the land of legends
Thieving = the ability to steal from buildings and sneak through area's such as tunnels and pipes for quick routes
Wood cutting = chop down different woods for supplies
Cooking = the ability to cook fish pies cakes and other foods
Herbalore = the ability to make special useful potions
Hunter = the ability to capture monsters and small animals for supplys and for a partner in battle
Melee Armours
Copper armour level 1
Iron armour level 10
Steel armour level 20
Mithril level 30
Adamant level 40
Ancient Armour level 45 made of magical silver
Marble Armour level 50
Dragonite Armour level 60
Angel's Armour level 70
Sheild of Fire level 75
Legendary Armour level 80
Archary Armour's
Leather level 1
Studded leather level 15
Baby dragon scale armour level 30
Ancient Archary Armour level 45
Queen dragon scale armour level 50
King dragon scale armour level 60
Angel's hide armour level 70
Legendary Hide armour level 80
Mage Robes
Magical Robes level 1
Magical bark Armour Level 10
Mystical Robes level 20
Enchanted Robes level 30
Ancient Robes Level 45
Infamous Robes level 60
Angel's Robes level 70
Legendary Robes Level 80
Melee Weapon's
Copper Weapons level 1
Iron Weapons level 10
Steel Weapons level 20
Mithril Weapons level 30
Adamant Weapons level 40
Marble Weapons level 50
Dragonite Weapons level 60
Abyssal weapons level 65
Magical Weapons level 70
Legendary Weapons level 80
Belts
Giants belt = reduces damage taken by 5% as well as granting player 20 bonus health
Belt of healing = heals 2% of missing health every 10 seconds
Capes
Cape of fire = while in combat cape burns enemy for 2 damage every second
Negatron cloak = reduces magic damage by 10%
Cloak of endurance = reduces the effects of stuns freezes and slow by 30%
Amulets
Amulet of rejuvenation = heals 5 health every 15 seconds
Rings
Ring of Reserection = while wearing ring if you die you will come back to life with a second chance 60% health restored
Ring of Life = Gives wearer 60 extra health
Ring of savior = 50% chance to keep special attack or runes when casting the spell or attack
Spells / spellbooks
Ancient magics spell book
Frost bite = does damage over time as well as slows players run speed
Flash frost = freezes player for 5 seconds
Frost shot = Stuns player for 1 seconds unable to eat move or teleport
Ice blast = freezes player for 10 seconds
Absolute Zero = stuns player for 3 seconds
Permafrost = slows players run speed
Glacial Prison = freezes player for 30 seconds
Frozen Domain = box of ice increasing magic damage to enemys inside for 5 seconds
Frozen tomb = freezes player in a tomb of ice for 15 seconds
Basic spells
Light binding = stuns player for 2 seconds
Toxic Blast = poison damage over time for 5 seconds
Chain of corruption = holds player in place for 15 seconds
Shock wave = sends a electric shot damaging enemy hit
Flux = electrical particals that lower champions strength temporary effect
Mystic shot = mystical magic damage
Rune prision = player is held in place for 5 seconds
Arcane blast = powerful magic damage
Arcane charge = strengthens the damage of arcane blast
Seismic Shard = slows players run speed temporarly
Soul siphon = heals player 10% of enemy health
Soul Shackles = chains player to ground for 10 seconds
Soul sheild = decreases damage taken bye 15% for 10 seconds
Shrouds of Darkness = surrounds enemy in dark magic slowing enemy over time
Siphoning strike = deals damage and returns 5% of damage to caster as health
Spirit fire = burning damage that strikes little damage and does extra damage over time
Divine Blessing = heals player for 20% health missing
Righteous Fury = any melee damage done over next 15 seconds leaves a bleeding affect for 5 seconds
Sonic wave = sends a strike of sound weakening player for 30 seconds taking 10% increased over all damage
If you are interested in supporting this project you can sign up on our forums here
http://thelandoflegends.org/Forums/
The Home page is thelandoflegends.org and is a temp website for now until we have our own graphics from the game to make a completely new website unique with our own content Server Developer Application
Name: Age: Time Zone: How long have you been programming? What languages can you program in: Past work How active can you be: Are you currently working on any other project (this includes personal projects)
Client Developer Application
Name: Age: Time Zone: Skype: How long have you been programming: Past work How active can you be: Are you currently working on any other project (this includes personal projects)
Website Developer:
You'll be required to build a website for the server, forums, embedding webclient's, general website maintenance and additions and have a large role in server to website integration so programming knowledge will be necessary, mainly in databases, sql / php and some java. Not a comprehensive knowledge of PHP and Java is required. Website Developer Application
Name: Age: Time Zone: Skype: How long have you been programming: How good are your MYSQL/SQL skills: Could you also be a graphics artist: Past work How active can you be: Are you currently working on any other project (this includes personal projects)
Graphic Artist: will work on the client game frame. It will keep the same tab positions with small changes to avoid confusion from the current layout we all know. It needs to have a unique look Graphics Artist Application
Name: Age: Time Zone: Skype: How long have you been making graphics: Past work: How active can you be: Are you currently working on any other project (this includes personal projects)
My skype is thelandoflegends you can reach me here if your also interested

item.title: A New beginning Heres your chance to create greatness
item.dc:creator: @TheLandofLegends TheLandofLegends
item.description:
@TheLandofLegends wrote:

[quote=“sertan8, post:2, topic:542969”]I’ve got you on skype now.

ot; is there already anything done? or are these just ideas[/quote]

So far I’ve just been coming up with all the idea’s i have more that are not on this here list that I am not a good programmer im just a guy with a great immagination and leading skills and im able to do managing and so on but i have to search for programmers for the project

Read full topic
item.source: A New beginning Heres your chance to create greatness

@TheLandofLegends wrote:

Hello this is the creation of a new beginning .
What this new creation will be is a mixture of runescape and league of legends to create something amazing new and unique for a great experence to gamers.

You must know Java extensively, and have a relatively good understanding . It would be beneficial if you had an understanding of any scripting languages, especially Ruby and/or Python as these languages may come into use later down the line of development. Of course content building and upgrading will be required and general debugging in the hosting stages.

All work is to be kept clean an noted to make thing’s easier to find and to be organized.

Developer’s are not to argue with one another.

Note we will not be using Runescapes client everything will be written from scratch to keep clear of any type of copyright
For that being said this project will require people who understand what they are doing and not someone who is only able to copy and paste what they see someone else do

Here is what I have come up with so far that will be in this game so far

                                                      The Land of Legends

Skills

Hitpoints = The amount life you can be hit for before dying

Accuracy = How often you hit over a 0 and the better weapons you can weild

archary = long distance ranged fighting ability high lever better chance to hit
